question.text:
‘Science and art are two separate cultures’ (paragraph 1)
How does the writer of Feedback discuss this claim in paragraph 17

A by emphasising that this predicament deserves to get more public
recognition
B by making fun of people who have tried to downplay this problem
C by noting that few people are even aware of the issue these days
D by offering a historical framework to prove the significance of this
dilemma
